channel.title: Options on Math2001's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Options on Math2001's blog

item.title: 'readonly' != 'modifiable'
item.description: Do you know the difference between those 2 options set readonly set nomodifiable All the readonly does, when enabled, is it prevents you from writing the file (you can bypass it by doing :w! though), while modifiable, when disabled prevents you from actually editing the buffer.
